content.text: As of the current date, the market capitalization of Deluxe Corp is $2.25 billion.

The following valuation ratios are relevant to evaluate Deluxe Corp stock compared to industry benchmarks:

1. Price-to-Earnings Ratio (P/E Ratio): The current P/E ratio of Deluxe Corp is X, which is higher/lower than the industry average.

2. Price-to-Sales Ratio (P/S Ratio): The current P/S ratio of Deluxe Corp is X, which is higher/lower than the industry average.

3. Price-to-Book Ratio (P/B Ratio): The current P/B ratio of Deluxe Corp is X, which is higher/lower than the industry average.

4. Dividend Yield: The current dividend yield of Deluxe Corp is X%, which is higher/lower than the industry average.

Based on the market capitalization and valuation metrics, Deluxe Corp stock is performing better/worse than industry benchmarks. Further analysis is recommended to determine the investment potential of Deluxe Corp stock.
